sentence.Network_en: He was magnanimous in defeat and praised his opponent's skill.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对失败表现得很洒脱，并且赞扬了对手的才能。

sentence.Network_en: He is a leader who is magnanimous in victory.
sentence.Network_cn: 他是个在胜利时宽宏大度的领袖.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin magnanimus (from magnus 'great' + animus 'soul') + -ous

entry.tran: （尤指对被自己击败或欺凌过自己的人）宽宏大量的，宽厚的，慷慨大度的
entry.def: If you are magnanimous, you behave kindly and generously towards someone, especially after defeating them or being treated badly by them.

example.ex: I was prepared to be magnanimous, prepared to feel compassion for him...
example.tran: 我准备表现得宽宏大量，同情他的境遇。

example.ex: He was a man capable of magnanimous gestures.
example.tran: 他是一个很有雅量的人。

sentences.sentence: "a heart big enough to hold no grudges"
"that's very big of you to be so forgiving"

auth_sentence.content: Jackson looked petty and jealous, Obama looked magnanimous.
auth_sentence.res_content: Jackson looked petty and jealous, Obama looked magnanimous.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jackson looked petty and jealous, Obama looked magnanimous.

auth_sentence.content: When she saw an evident necessity she braved danger with magnanimous courage.
auth_sentence.res_content: When she saw an evident necessity she braved danger with magnanimous courage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When she saw an evident necessity she braved danger with magnanimous courage.

auth_sentence.content: Magnanimous in defeat, he will note the successes of this campaign as well as the failings and demand more.
auth_sentence.res_content: Magnanimous in defeat, he will note the successes of this campaign as well as the failings and demand more.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Magnanimous in defeat, he will note the successes of this campaign as well as the failings and demand more.

stems_affixes.word_buile: in无+anim生命,精神+ate……的→adj.无生命的
long长+anim生命+ous……的→生命耐久→忍耐的
magn大+anim生命+ous……的→大生命→心胸博大
un=uni一个+anim生命+ous……的→[大家]同一个生命→一致的
anim生命,精神+al物→有生命的东西→动物
animate[v.使有生气,活泼]+ion动作或状态→animation生动;动画
anim生命,精神+osity多……的状态→生命太多→由爱变恨→仇恨
equ平等+anim生命+ity表名词→生命平等→平静
